ygData.subject: Re: Fatigue Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ok.  I haven t had this problem yet though; my Dwarven Paladin has a STA 95, my Troll Warrior a STA 120. Haven t seen any difficulties in battle. ...
ygData.messageBody:
--- Jason Coan <COANJ@...> wrote:
> run out of stamina your stats start to drop, which
> in turn lowers your attack and AC

Ok. I haven't had this problem yet though; my Dwarven
Paladin has a STA 95, my Troll Warrior a STA 120.
Haven't seen any difficulties in battle.

===
